title: Health Alerts - Disease Prevention and Control, San Francisco Department of Public Health
sitename: Disease Prevention and Control, San Francisco Department of Public Health
cleaned_text: The San Francisco Department of Public Health sends out Health Alerts, Advisories, and Updates regarding communicable disease outbreaks, [immunization updates](https://www.sfcdcp.org/vax-facts-vaccine-updates/), and emerging infectious diseases to San Francisco clinicians. Clinicians can [sign-up or submit updated contact information](https://www.sfcdcp.org/register-for-health-alerts/) to receive Health Alerts. All contact information is kept confidential. [Click for disease reporting numbers, lab forms, and legally reportable diseases](https://www.sfcdcp.org/communicable-disease/disease-reporting/). Urgency Level Categories Advisory: Provides important information for specific incident or situation; may not require immediate action. Update: Provides updated information regarding an incident or situation; unlikely to require immediate action.
